DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this study is to collect raw waveform data for two separate noninvasive methods, both of which may be useful for the assessment of upper airway obstruction.
DOC.brief_title: Assessment of PPG & PAT to Detect Upper Airway Obstruction in Patients With Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Patients twentyone years of age or older Patient refusal to participate in study Patients under 21 (twentyone) years of age, Referring physician's refusal to have his/her patient participate in the study. Patients with cardiac dysrhythmia (arrhythmia), including atrial fibrillation, and frequent premature atrial and/or ventricular contractions. Inability to obtain a Sotera cuff pressure and/or PPG signals
